effect.Name: Negation
effect.description: Negation - (The effect comes from the Krita) The absolute of the 1.0f value subtracted by the base subtracted by the blend layer. abs(1.0f - Base - Blend)
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Negation (Background) Shader | 1.0 (23.06.2024) */
parameter.description: (The effect comes from the Krita) The absolute of the 1.0f value subtracted by the base subtracted by the blend layer. abs(1.0f - Base - Blend)

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable sets the intensity of blend visibility
